description: This file serves as the server-side rendering (SSR) entry point for a Qwik application. It imports server rendering functions, a manifest, and the root component, then exports a default function that renders the app to a stream with specified options.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Exports a default function that performs server-side rendering of the Root component using provided options, configuring stream rendering with manifest, container attributes, and server data.
